pullRequest.title: [1.15.x] Added entity nameplate rendering event hook
pullRequest.bodyText: Adds a new event hook RenderNameplateEvent.

commit.message: - Added entity nameplate rendering event hook
- Added entity nameplate rendering event hook

nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,67 @@ +package net.minecraftforge.client.event; + +import com.google.common.base.Strings; +import net.minecraft.entity.Entity; +import net.minecraftforge.common.MinecraftForge; +import net.minecraftforge.eventbus.api.Event; + +/** + * RenderNameplateEvent is fired whenever the entity renderer attempts to render a name plate/tag of an entity. + *
+ * {@link #entity} contains the entity in which the plate is being rendered to. This cannot be changed by mods.
+ * {@link #nameplateContent} contains the content being rendered on the name plate/tag. This can be changed by mods.
+ * {@link #originalContent} contains the original content being rendered on the name plate/tag. This cannot be changed by mods.
+ *
+ * This event {@link HasResult}.
+ * This event has a result. ALLOW will force-render name plate/tag, & DENY will prevent name plate/tag from rendering

commit.message:
- Updated RenderNameplateEvent.java doc
- Fixed getOriginalContent() not returning original content
- Replaced .equals() with == operator

nodes.bodyText:
No whitespace changes in patches.
Still produces invalid code, because Event is not a thing in this class.
Why are we silently converting null to empty?
This file doesn't follow the code formatting guidelines.

commit.message:
- Removed nullToEmpty
- Fixed patch
- Removed import from patch
- Fixed formatting to comply with guidelines
- Fixed formatting issue in nameplate rendering event test class

nodes.bodyText: Should extend EntityEvent instead of the raw Event class
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,67 @@ +package net.minecraftforge.client.event; + +import com.google.common.base.Strings; +import net.minecraft.entity.Entity; +import net.minecraftforge.common.MinecraftForge; +import net.minecraftforge.eventbus.api.Event; + +/** + * RenderNameplateEvent is fired whenever the entity renderer attempts to render a name plate/tag of an entity. + *
+ * {@link #entity} contains the entity in which the plate is being rendered to. This cannot be changed by mods.
+ * {@link #nameplateContent} contains the content being rendered on the name plate/tag. This can be changed by mods.
+ * {@link #originalContent} contains the original content being rendered on the name plate/tag. This cannot be changed by mods.
+ *
+ * This event {@link HasResult}.
+ * This event has a result. ALLOW will force-render name plate/tag, DEFAULT will ignore the hook and continue using the vanilla check + * & DENY will prevent name plate/tag from rendering
+ *
+ * This event is fired on the {@link MinecraftForge#EVENT_BUS}. + **/ +@Event.HasResult +public class RenderNameplateEvent extends Event

commit.message:
- RenderNameplateEvent now extends EntityEvent
- Removed unnecessary entity getter

nodes.bodyText: You should also pass in the MatrixStack and the IRenderTypeBuffer to the event, in case anyone wants to render something special on the nameplate

commit.message: - Added MatrixStack and IRenderTypeBuffer to event
